text: I finally made it to the top of the list. I got my Pfizer Vaccination. I think you’ll like this iMovie Trailer I made of my experience at my hospital Ascension Borgess in Kalamazoo, Michigan across town from where it was made. #ShotOfHope #COVID19 #Vaccine #WeAreAscension 🧡☮️🙏🏻 https://t.co/ZJamz7esWd
